channel.title: Server Cache - Need Help
channel.description:
hey guys im sure this is a new question but iv never did this before, i usually download 524 or lower server because i never understood what i was ment to do with the cache, atm im downloading Nexus source, Matrix Cache and a random 718+ client, but no idea were the cache is ment to go :/ please PM me or leave a message or add my skype
Skype: Huseyinn.7

item.title: Server Cache - Need Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

RB Server:

anywere on :c drive? and do other people who want to join me need to put it in there :c Drive?

No, In the route of your c:/ drive, E.g:
This is the route of where your cache is going to go: C:/(cachename)
And other people wouldn’t need to put it manually if it’s auto cache. If it’s not, then yes they will.

Read full topic
